item.title: Project
item.description: Other Openreplay contributor apiRTC with react-native Apizee React Apirtc is a browser JS library, with Apizee, the goal was to adapt this library to Android ans iOS technologies. An example is publish on github, and the library is avaible on NPM website Website Game Pac-man Pac-man game with java, See here !
item.content:
Other

Openreplay contributor

apiRTC with react-native

Apizee React

Apirtc is a browser JS library, with Apizee, the goal was to adapt this library to Android ans iOS technologies.

An example is publish on github, and the library is avaible on NPM website

Website

Game

Pac-man

Pac-man game with java, See here !

item.title: Savinien Barbotas
item.description: Hi, I’m Savinien. I am an apprentice engineer in the IT field at ENSSAT, in Lannion. Currently focus on real-time communication developpement at Apizee. My Github personal repo: https://github.com/Shahere My Github professional repo: https://github.com/SavinienBarbotaud You can reach me at sbarbota@enssat.fr
item.content:
Hi,

I’m Savinien. I am an apprentice engineer in the IT field at ENSSAT, in Lannion.

Currently focus on real-time communication developpement at Apizee.

  • My Github personal repo: https://github.com/Shahere
  • My Github professional repo: https://github.com/SavinienBarbotaud

You can reach me at sbarbota@enssat.fr

item.title: Skills
item.description: Current work Apizee I’m currently working in co-op program at Apizee. My goal is to develop feature, and do intern support for the Javascript library ApiRTC. At Apizee, I have progressed in a lot of computer science area, Docker, Kubernetes, network management, operating system management… Previous work DIRISI For my 1st job in computer science, I was welcomed at the DIRISI’s french army branch. My goal was to develop an Django (Python) web appplication for ships, monitoring traffic
item.content:
Current work

Apizee

I’m currently working in co-op program at Apizee.

My goal is to develop feature, and do intern support for the Javascript library ApiRTC.

At Apizee, I have progressed in a lot of computer science area, Docker, Kubernetes, network management, operating system management…

Previous work

DIRISI

For my 1st job in computer science, I was welcomed at the DIRISI’s french army branch.

My goal was to develop an Django (Python) web appplication for ships, monitoring traffic

Summer work

Sailing instructor

My first job was at the Loguivy nautical club as sailing instructor.

My role was to teach sailing to the youngest
